review: Very nice product. It is very fast and fairly easy to setup. I had to consult the help to find the MAC address. I did learn that the Fire TV app is really for phones and not tablets. I installed it on my Nexus 7 and it ran, but could not get it to register the device. I installed the app on my android phone and was able to register the device to it and use it, including the voice control. It was a great deal for the $20 I got it for. I should have ordered the maximum on 2.
author: J. Tidwell

review: This was well worth the $19 I paid just to access Prime video & other amazon content streaming instead of having to wait for a download to the TiVo. Haven't even explored the other apps yet as most are already available on our other devices, but impressed with the Prime content alone already!
author: Tracey Birch

review: I was disappointed that I can't add channels as I can with Roku.
author: Amazon Customer

review: I ordered this during the 2 day sale and only paid 19.00.  I still don't have it. I've been notified I won't get it till mid-Jan. I am moving the end of Dec. Now I have to  cancel my order and get in line again in Jan. Amazon - I love you but you really dropped the ball here.
author: Cynthia Bigelow

review: It's bigger than I expected, and it took 4 tries to find my wireless network, but once it found the network and updated its software, it seemed to work nicely.  I only explored Amazon Prime so far and was pleasantly surprised at the choices.I am looking for a way out of my expensive and unreliable cable TV.  Maybe this will help.
author: Jean A Gresick Schugsta

review: Easy to use. I love it.
author: Shirley Maraman

review: So easy to set up, intuitive remote and simple operation. Love the music app, complete with scrolling lyrics! Kids love the games. Overall A+ -- I am a Prime subscriber for the shipping, but I can definitely see myself using the full offerings of Prime now that it is in my living room, rather than just a PC!
author: Amazon Customer

review: It works really well. Deducted 1 star for no HBOgo app. Easier to use than chromecast for watching netflix and Hulu, and I like that it has a remote.<edit>: After months of use, I really wish I could "cast" to this, but screen mirroring doesn't work with windows 8. I guess I'm stuck using chromecast for some things until they get that straightened out. Maybe windows 10 will fix it.
author: Matt

review: This is a good product. I payed $100 for a Roku Cube and this does everything and more than the cube
author: Dorothy A. Anagnostis
